title: Really love it!
text: I‚Äôm not much of a gambler, never have been, but the variety of ways that are provided to enjoy the apps betting entertainment just entices you to try at least one of their lottery methods, even to place the smallest of bets can be done with such ease and security. I feel like a lot of people that leave reviews for this sort of thing don‚Äôt initially consider the possibility of losing money or the process they would have to go through in order to be eligible for withdrawing winnings etc, but if all aspects have been considered and you enter their world with open-mindedness, then you can‚Äôt really be disappointed! I personally love LottoLands layout - both on the website and the mobile app - and find it easy to locate new and intriguing ways to indulge in their gambling practices. 5/5 will definitely remain a fellow LottoLander, thanks to all the team for the hard effort they put in to provide such a service.

title: Good App
text: This is a very good app and interesting to see and participate in all the different draws. You have to watch very carefully the bet you place because Lottoland has a very dubious practice of slotting in another game under the price of your bet and when you check out you‚Äôve found your account has been debited for a game you haven‚Äôt signed up for. Another dodgy practice is when you choose a new lotto game to play and you click on the betting slip you will find about 5 lines of numbers already pre selected and you have to be wise and delete them all before placing your own bets otherwise you are going to have a very large debit coming from your account. If it wasn‚Äôt for these dubious processes I would have given a 5 star rating.

title: Great App
text: The App is definitely easy to use when compared to other lotto and betting apps I tried and I would also say it has a greater bag of promos on offer too. In comparison to a majority of other lottery apps Lottoland definitely has a wider variety of lotteries on there, a few tongue twisters Lol but would deffo say the options are there. Customer service is pretty good can‚Äôt complain, initially I got confused with the withdrawals and to my amazement I was generally happy with the customer service my issue was resolved first time. Nice swift replies on the online chat and the chap was understanding and really helpful. I wouldn‚Äôt mind if the app was a lil faster then again, I wouldn‚Äôt mind if I actually won the lottery lool so far so good.

title: Sur-Par
text:
The app itself is fairly decent in the sense, however, once you‚Äôve purchased the deals they provide, you don‚Äôt have an option to select those scratch cards from a menu. Instead, you have to manually search for them. Also, I‚Äôve put a bit of cash here and there to this. I‚Äôm not the biggest gambler, but when you‚Äôre only winning 1p or 2p every now and then, you feel as though gambling on here is useless. That‚Äôs the only reason for three stars. Is the app layout. 

If you‚Äôre a fan of petty change, this app is for you. If not, find something with a little bit of a winning stance.

title: Very disgusted
text: Signed up for a bit of fun, games are fun  and the jackpot overdrive was an interesting concept but the sign up was easy no hard verification needed just a card number and that was all, tried to withdraw only ¬£15 and it asked me for ID verification (driving license) took a picture of my license and tried to upload it as per the instructions but there was no way I could, just kept saying contact customer services. I‚Äôm really disgusted by the practice. How on earth is it perfectly acceptable to sign up to these things whilst only needing to click a button to say you are over the legal gambling age of your country yet to withdraw they require much more information to verify you. Will never use this again

title: I initially gave this 1 star but was so wrong....
text: I initially gave this app 1 star because I thought the payout time was way too long (says on site 5 - 10 working days). My payments have normally appeared within 3 working days so I cannot complain. The online help is also excellent if you have a query - especially Niall and Jim - so I cannot complain. An excellent app and well deserved 5 star!

title: Such a great way to win
text: So last night I decided to give this app ago as I‚Äôve used other gambling apps before such as William hill & 888 casino and while spending like ¬£25-50 on each of those I never won any of my money back but I decided to give this ago on a few games that I‚Äôve seen you tubers play and I was very impressed that this app allows you to get a few big wins and keeps you interested with a lot of different others such as the scratch cards and live games

title: Certain games don‚Äôt work
text: The app is quite straightforward and easy to use, however I purchased some tickets for a game and I was not able to use them as the app was unresponsive on that specific game. I don‚Äôt really mind about the lost money as it is an insignificant amount but their customer service approach is quite disappointing!

title: Needs improvement

The customer service did help me and I managed to get my money back into my lotto wallet but I was then unable to withdraw my funds.
